description: This file defines a class BrightDataTools that provides methods for interacting with Bright Data API, including scraping web pages, taking screenshots, performing searches, and retrieving structured web data from various sources. It uses external libraries such as requests, base64, json, and uuid, and integrates with other modules like agno.agent, agno.media, agno.tools, and agno.utils.log.

classes.name: BrightDataTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Bright Data API, providing methods for web scraping, screenshots, search, and data feed retrieval.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the BrightDataTools instance with API key, zones, options, and sets up tools.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to the Bright Data API with the given payload.

methods.name: scrape_as_markdown
methods.description: Scrapes a webpage and returns the content in Markdown format.

methods.name: get_screenshot
methods.description: Captures a screenshot of a webpage, encodes it in base64, and adds it as an image artifact via the provided agent.

methods.name: search_engine
methods.description: Performs a search query using specified search engine and returns results in Markdown.

methods.name: web_data_feed
methods.description: Retrieves structured web data from various sources like LinkedIn, Amazon, Instagram, etc., based on source_type and URL.
